name: Voting Day
description:
Voting Day was originally made to encourage Venezuelans to go vote on a presidential election. I think it's now a great reminder for everyone that voting in your country is very, very important.

The game is based in the old Game&Watch series of games, so the way to play is simple. Share it with your friends. For web browsers in desktops, cell phones and tablets.

Credits

Design and programming: Ciro Durán.
Graphics: Alexander Hass (@Gagz9k) and Ciro Durán.
Thanks to: Yole Quintero, Julián Rojas Millán and Saúl González.
